features: 3-in-1: 16GB Multiboot USB flash drive for Ubuntu 22.04 LTS 64bit & 20.04 LTS 64bit, Lubuntu 18.04 LTS 32bit. All are LTS versions, namely, Long Terrm Support Version.

Compatibility: Works with any brand's laptop and desktop PC such as HP,Dell,Lenovo,Samsung,Toshiba,Sony,Acer,Asus, both legacy BIOS and UEFI booting mode, except for Apple computers, Chromebooks and ARM-based devices.

Popularity：Most popular linux distributions and all come with common software includes office suite, web browser, image editing, multimedia, and email except Lubuntu which is desgined to targted for very old PC.
Support: Print user guide and support available. please contact us for help if you have an issue.
Live USB or install: You can either try on USB or install on hard drive.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 3-in-1 Ubuntu Linux USB | Multi-boot Linux USB Flash Drive 3-in-1: 16GB Multiboot USB flash drive for Ubuntu 22.04 LTS 64bit & 20.04 LTS 64bit, Lubuntu 18.04 LTS 32bit. All are LTS versions, namly, Long Terrm Support Version. BTW, Ubuntu 23 is NOT suggested as it's not LTS version.Compatibility: Works with any brand's laptop and desktop PC, legacy BIOS or UEFI booting, except for Apple computers, Chromebooks and ARM-based devices.Popularity: Most popular Linux distributions and all come with common software includes office suite, web browser, image editing, multimedia, and email except Lubuntu which is designed to targted for very old PC.Support: A print user guide is included and please email support for help.Live USB or install: You can either try on USB or install on hard drive.

Computer Requirements Compatible with any brands' PC and server except for ARM-based computers and Macs with Apple silicon. In addition USB port or USB adapter required. Boot Mode Both Legacy BIOS and UEFI mode, but when using UEFI mode, secure boot need to be disabled in BIOS settings. License GNU lifetime License Packaging The bootable USB drive comes in a colored PET/CPP zipper bag with instructions on how to get started. The box pictured is not included.
